page.title: 08OCCUPATIONS
page.content: We looked at occupations in three main areas,Thornton and Stainton,which are both villages and Thornhill Estate,a modern suburb of Middlesbrough.We did a random survey,questionnaire based,in all three areas. {STAINTON.} Occupants here are older people.Men showed 35%retired,45%employed and 20%unemployed.Women showed 30%retired, 15%working and 55%never worked. {THORNTON.} An affluent village.Among men we found 75%employment,20%retired and only 5% not working.50% of women work, 40% are housewives who never work,10% retired. {THORNHILL. } Occupation here mainly stems from industry.Among men we found 86%working 14%unemployed. Among women 55%employed and 45%not working.
